meanings.definition: A group of signaling proteins produced by the immune system in response to viral infections.
meanings.sent1: The interferons helped the body fight off the virus.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study interferons to understand how the immune system responds to infections.
meanings.sent3: The interferons in the body were like tiny messengers delivering important news to the immune system.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against viruses, interferons act as vigilant guards protecting the body.
meanings.sent5: The role of interferons is crucial in defending the body against harmful invaders.

meanings.definition: To disrupt or hinder the normal functioning of a process or system.
meanings.sent1: The storm interferons with the satellite signals, causing disruptions in communication.
meanings.sent2: Avoiding distractions is important so they don't interferons with your work.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to interferons with the puzzle pieces by batting them around.
meanings.sent4: His loud laughter interferons with the peaceful atmosphere of the library.
meanings.sent5: The faulty wiring can interferons with the entire electrical system of the house.
